name: Scrippy-the-scraper
tagline: A PHP scraping script I am studying thinking to develop in a full application
body:
![Scrippy](http://mbngmortgage.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/dog-digging-a-hole.jpg)

### Hi this is Scrippy The Scrapper.

This is not a terror movie character, this is just by now a bunch of short PHP scripts looking to fit together to convert into a full web application. I am trying to make this something more like where you can just input into forms the data you'll need to scrap from a website, setup the database where to store it and click! sounds interesting ahh? 

Everybody is welcome to fork and look at this code, submit your ideas, create/close issues and invite me to a starbucks coffee where I will be spending most of my weekends studying and improving more this app ;)
